name: Wait. Warp!
description:
Join the BGP Discord!

Dodge hazards, get each character to a Goal. Features 12 levels!

Controls
  • Warp: WASD / Arrow Keys / Left-Analog Stick / D-Pad
  • Restart: R
  • Next Level: N
  • Back to last Level: B
Music:

Music by Mark Sparling used with permission.

Daily December 20 2018 #887 (LSDJ) | Mark Sparling

Known Bugs:
  • A few places where the auto-tile system doesn't work
  • Dying but still "completing" a level (on levels with multiple characters)

Made for LOWREZJAM 2021 in 11.5 hours
